about.paragraph1: Everhart Steeple Services is a family owned and operated business whose goal is to keep local churches looking pristine. We strive to provide the highest quality service at the best prices.
about.paragraph2: Our philosophy is that whenever we answer the phone, we find a friend on the line. Customers always come first here at Everhart Steeple Services, and we believe in being active in the community or helping whenever we can.
about.paragraph3: Please let us know if there is anything we can do to make your experience with us a good one. We're here to help!
